text: White House coronavirus response coordinator Dr. Deborah Birx appears to ignore question about Pres. Trump's use of hydroxychloroquine, an unproven drug he's touted for COVID-19, instead commenting on the weather. https://t.co/OliE7A8piI https://t.co/zawLk8U7rT
